name: @wso2is/x509-certificate-authentication-portal
description: WSO2 Identity Server X509 Certificate Authentication Portal
author: WSO2

scripts.clean: pnpm clean:lock-files && pnpm clean:maven-folders && pnpm clean:node-modules
scripts.clean:lock-files: pnpx rimraf package-lock.json && pnpx rimraf pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpx rimraf yarn.lock
